Serialized Form

  • Package com.rotartsi.jgame.crypto

    • Class com.rotartsi.jgame.crypto.RSA extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • modulus

          BigInteger modulus
          Messages are moded by this value to both encrypt and decrypt.

        • nBits

          int nBits
          The bit-length of the privateKey.

        • phi

          BigInteger phi
          TODO: Add javadoc

        • privateKey

          BigInteger privateKey
          Messages are raised to the power of the privateKey mod RSA.modulus to decrypt them.

          To encrypt, the are raised to the power of 65537 mod RSA.modulus.

    • Class com.rotartsi.jgame.crypto.UserDatabase extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cipher

          Cipher cipher
          Cipher used to encrypt user data. By default it is AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding (Advanced Encryption Standard with Cipher Block Chaining with PKC5 Padding.)

        • saltLen

          int saltLen
          The length of salts used for HMAC512 to hash the passcodes. 16 characters should be enough.

        • userData

          HashMap<String,​HashMap<String,​Byte[]>> userData
          Contains the following:
          1. Initialization Vectors (used for key generation to encrypt user data)
          2. Salts (Used to hash passwords)
          3. Password Hash Digests
          4. User Data (Encrypted using the user's passcode, salt, and init vector)

  • Package com.rotartsi.jgame.game

    • Class com.rotartsi.jgame.game.Game extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • runner

          GameRunner runner
          The "parent" runner that is running this game. See GameRunner

        • state

          String state
          The current state of the game. This dictates what event handlers are active and what code is being executed for the mainloop (both blitting and logic updates)

        • states

          HashMap<String,​State> states
          A HashMap containing all of the states for this game.

    • Class com.rotartsi.jgame.game.GameRunner extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • game

          Game game
          The game that is running (See Game)

    • Class com.rotartsi.jgame.game.State.MenuHandler extends JMenuBar implements Serializable

    • Class com.rotartsi.jgame.image.SurfaceMapDemo extends GameRunner implements Serializable
